1499410.name: Deep Sea
1499410.description:
Deep Sea is a story-driven adventure game where players take on the role of Amara, who is overcome with grief since the death of her grandfather. Amara discovers an imprisoned water spirit that promises to bring her grandfather back, but in doing so is tricked into unleashing a deadly and impassable storm on the islands she calls home.

Players will have to use the skills learned from Amara’s grandfather to overcome her grief and find a way to weaken and eventually imprison the water spirit. Along the way, they will explore beautiful islands, solve puzzles, and uncover ancient artifacts that hold the key to stopping the storm.

Key features

  • Explore visually stunning islands, each with their own unique story and challenges to overcome
  • Discover artifacts lost to time and uncover their hidden past in an attempt to save your home
  • Listen to an emotionally captivating soundtrack composed by industry veterans
  • Relive past memories and apply their lessons throughout your journey of self-discovery
1499410.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 乌克兰语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
